docs.snippet: It has never been difficult to foresee that the completion of the Central Park must inevitably produce a very marked effect upon the character and habits of our people, especially on Sundays. The fashionable classes, professional men, and people...
docs.lead_paragraph: It has never been difficult to foresee that the completion of the Central Park must inevitably produce a very marked effect upon the character and habits of our people, especially on Sundays. The fashionable classes, professional men, and people whose engagements give them some leisure every day, will visit the Park and use it for recreation on week days.
